title: LLM as an Attack Simulator
techStack: Python, OpenAI/GPT-4, Word2Vec, TF-IDF, Cybersecurity Datasets
details: Developed a modular framework for generating time-aligned MHMS cyberattack logs using LLMs.
Created topology summarizer, attack interpreter, and log correlation modules.
Evaluated log realism with Word2Vec & TF-IDF against OpenSSH & Hadoop logs (>98% similarity).

title: Portfolio Optimization using Deep Reinforcement Learning
techStack: Python, PyTorch, TRPO, PPO, RAC, NumPy, Pandas
details: Designed a DRL-based system for risk-sensitive portfolio optimization with Sortino ratio rewards.
Implemented TRPO, PPO with transformer encoder, and RAC for dynamic asset allocation.
Simulated realistic markets with transaction costs and backtesting support.

title: CNN-based Binary Image Classifier
details: Trained a CNN to classify images from a custom binary dataset with 88.89% validation accuracy.
Handled data preprocessing, model tuning, and performance evaluation.

title: Linear Regressions on Student Performance
details: Predicted a performance index using engineered features like study hours, prior grades, and sleep.
Achieved ~0.65 R² score and performed residual diagnostics and feature correlation analysis.

title: CampusKart
details: Built a cross-platform student marketplace with OTP login, dynamic search, and CRUD listings.
Integrated backend APIs with secure authentication and in-app chat system.

title: CauseCraft – NGO Hosting Platform
techStack: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, AWS S3
details: Developed a SaaS platform for NGOs with drag-drop site builder and role-based access.
Enabled one-click deployment, volunteer-task management, and secure image hosting.

title: Tic Tac Toe with AI
details: Built a terminal-based Tic Tac Toe AI using recursive Minimax with unbeatable logic.
Used terminal UI and ensured optimal play with score back-propagation.
